puzzle_1.clue_1.page_1:
PUZZLE #1 CLUE #1/5

A skeleton far away is waiting for you, eager to make you progress onto the next clue. However, I'm not going to tell you where this entity is.
puzzle_1.clue_1.page_2:
Just a little side note:

I only have one translator. He translated this book. He is pretty weird though. I compare him to William Shakespeare because of his interesting choice of words.
puzzle_1.clue_1.page_3: I don't even know if he translated it into the right language. He just written one book and just left me.
